alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:29PM CDT until April 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Heflin, or 15 miles south of Minden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sibley, Gibsland, Dubberly, Heflin, Bienville, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Sailes, Noles Landing, Lake Bistineau North, Ogden and Ada. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
